p: The analyses were performed on an UFLC (LC-20AD, Shimadzu) system coupled to a diode array detector (DAD) and a mass spectrometer (ESI-qTOF microTOF-Q III, Bruker Daltonics). A chromatography column Kinetex C-18 (2.6 Î¼, 150 x 2.2 mm, Phenomenex) was used with a pre-column of the same stationary phase material.
